title: I Became The Hero’s Mother - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Childcare   Elemental Magic   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Transmigration
author: Ko Eun Chae   고은채
description:
On my third year of being a fangirl to the male protagonist.

I was caught by the tyrant Duke Hades Louvremont, who was a fool for his son.

'Constantly following me, offering expensive gifts, and even desperate enough to go all the way to the north regardless of the dangers in here...'

'I'm very sorry. I have nothing more to say.'

'Alright, I concede. I can't pretend to be oblivious anymore.'

'...As expected, I'm your ideal man, aren't I? I don't think I've ever witnessed such devotion.'

'Many women have long been pursuing me, but I've never seen anyone as persistent as you. It's rather fascinating. Of course, we can proceed with the marriage as soon as possible.'

'Hah...?'

'By all means, I'll do it.'

'I-I'm sorry, what?! What did you say?'

...What did he mean by that?

I must've heard that wrong, right?

Yet the duke let out a bloody smile at my blank face and gave me a proper confirmation.

'I said I'll do it. I'll marry you.'

Oh my god.

The hero's father is extremely narcissistic!>
